title: Font Constructor
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922020438/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Software](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922020438/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Software) : [Font Editors](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922020438/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Font%20Editors) : Font Constructor**

Font Constructor is a standalone Mac-only application that builds characters using basic components to construct letter shapes.

[http://www.fontconstructor.com/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20130922020438/http:/www.fontconstructor.com/index.html "http://www.fontconstructor.com/index.html")
author: paul d hunt
